work.name: Yeshiva Rabbi Samson Raphael Hirsch
highlights: Maintained a friendly and approachable demeanor, effectively addressing inquiries, concerns, and providing accurate information promptly to students, parents, and staff.
Facilitated the smooth operation of school activities by ordering necessary supplies and implementing efficient inventory management practices.

Led the marketing and fundraising efforts for the entire school, including developing and executing campaigns across multiple channels
